parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: Grant type. Right now we only support 'client_credentials' value.

parameters.name: request_token
parameters.description: Your JWT Request Token. Check docs to see how to generate it.

get.summary: Retrieves the KYC status for a user

200.description: The KYC status for the user

404.description: Either there is no user found for this id or there is no KYC status.

post.summary: Create a client user for an entity

parameters.name: client-user-id
parameters.description: the unique identifier of your user

requestBody.description: The client user to be added.

put.summary: Adds entity details to an existing user
put.description: It is only possible to provide this information once, edits should be requested through support.

requestBody.description: The entity information to be attached.

400.description: Some validation failed on the request body.

409.description: Data has already been provided for this entity.

get.summary: Retrieves the KYC report for a user

404.description: Either there is no user found for this id or there is no KYC report.

delete.summary: Remove all data for a user-site
delete.description: This will remove all data linked to the user-site, such as accounts and transactions

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. Fill this in when a user initiates this action.

post.description: Get a form or url that the user needs to fill in or be redirected to respectively, in order to create a connection (user-site) to a site.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. Fill this in when a user initiates this action.

parameters.name: redirectUrlId
parameters.description: The redirectUrl to use. Required for sites with a DIRECT_CONNECTION. Might be left empty in case of a SCRAPING site where there's no redirect.

put.summary: Trigger a refresh for a user-site

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. Fill this in when a user initiates this action.

get.summary: Retrieve the next step in the flow to create/update a user-site.

parameters.name: userSiteId
parameters.description: The user-site id. This value is returned when you initiated the flow via POST /user-sites.

post.summary: Renew the access for a user-site
post.description: Starts a new consent flow for a client-user. This is needed when the credentials are expired or invalid.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. Fill this in when a user initiates this action.

parameters.name: redirectUrlId
parameters.description: The redirectUrl to use. Required for sites with a DIRECT_CONNECTION. Might be left empty in case of a SCRAPING site where there's no redirect.

500.description: Technical Error or the authentication means for given provider are missing.

post.description: Provide the redirect URL in this endpoint after the user granted consent for a payment initiation.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. This might be required for some banks.

400.description: This site does not support payments (PIS).

500.description: Failed to submit payment to the bank.

put.summary: Trigger a refresh for all user-sites

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. Fill this in when a user initiates this action.

get.description: Gets the status of a previously submitted payment.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. This might be required for some banks.

400.description: This site does not support payments (PIS).

500.description: Unable to retrieve payment status at the bank

get.description: Get all available sites, optionally filtered by tags and/or redirectUrlId.

parameters.name: redirectUrlId
parameters.description: An optional redirectUrlId to use for filtering

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: An optional list of tags to use for filtering. Only sites containing ALL tags will be retrieved.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. Fill this in when a user initiates this action. If not, it can be left empty.

400.description: This site does not support payments (PIS).

404.description: The client redirect url could not be found.

post.summary: Create or update a new user-site
post.description: Create or update a user-site by posting a filled in form or redirect url. Any redirect url or filled in form can be posted to this endpoint. Whether you are updating or creating a new user site depends on whether the flow was initiated by '/v1/users/<>/connect' or '/v1/users/<>/user-sites/<>/renew-access'.

parameters.name: PSU-IP-Address
parameters.description: The ipv4 or ipv6 address of the client-user performing an action. Fill this in when a user initiates this action.

requestBody.description: An object containing a redirect-url or a filled-in form. You need to indicate which of the two you are sending by setting setting the field loginType to value URL or FORM respectively.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of accounts that belong to a specific User.
get.description: Retrieve a list of accounts for the user identified by the path parameter userId. The query parameter userSiteId can be used to narrow the results down to a specific UserSite.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the User for which to list accounts.

parameters.name: userSiteId
parameters.description: Optional identifier of the UserSite, if present only accounts linked to the UserSite will be returned.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of transactions that belong to a specific User.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: Optional list of accountIds to be used as filter. It can be provided as a comma-separated list.

parameters.name: dateInterval
parameters.description:
Date interval with end-date included for which the transactions should be retrieved. Current month if this parameter is not specified. (example: 2016-07-01/2016-07-31) Supported format: 
'start-date'/'end-date'
'start-date'/'duration'
'duration'/'end-date'.
The duration is in Period format: ISO-8601. The date format is also according to ISO-8601, i.e. the default Local Date (Time) Formatter

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Used for pagination. If an initial call to this endpoint returns an object where the field 'next' is not null, then not all transactions were returned and more can be fetched. To fetch more transactions, call this endpoint again and set this query parameter to the value of the field 'next' that was previously returned. Repeat until the field next contains null.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the User for which to list transactions.

requestBody.description: The user's personal details. **Only required and allowed when YTS performs Know Your Customer (KYC) as a service for the client.**

expires_in.description: The lifetime in seconds of the access tokens

scope.description: Scopes, expressed as a list of space-delimited, case-sensitive strings

AccessTokenResponse.title: AccessTokenResponse
AccessTokenResponse.description: Object containing the API Access Token and its details

AddClientUserEntity.description: Information you have to provide to create a client-user for an entity

country.description: A valid two-letter ISO country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

houseNumber.description: The house number of the address

houseNumberExtension.description: The optional extension of the house number

postalCode.description: The postal code or zipcode of the address

province.description: The optional province of state of the address

streetName.description: The street name of the address

clientId.description: The id of the client where the client-user belongs to

created.description: The creation date of the client-user

ClientUser.title: ClientUser
ClientUser.description: The client-user is the end-user of a client.

chamberOfCommerceNumber.description: The chamber of commerce number where the entity is registered on.

intermediaryShareholderEntity.description: Information you have to provide regarding the intermediate shareholder entity.

legalForm.description: The legal form the entity is registered on. For more information: https://business.gov.nl/starting-your-business/choosing-a-business-structure/business-structures-in-the-netherlands-overview/

legalName.description: The legal name of the entity registered at the chamber of commerce.

sbiCode.description: An SBI code describes the main activity of a entity. All companies with similar business activities share the same SBI code. For more information: https://business.gov.nl/running-your-business/business-management/administration/sbi-codes/

tradingName.description: One or more optional trading names the organization operates under.

chamberOfCommerceNumber.description: The chamber of commerce number where the entity is registered on.

legalForm.description: The legal form the entity is registered on. For more information: https://business.gov.nl/starting-your-business/choosing-a-business-structure/business-structures-in-the-netherlands-overview/

sbiCode.description: An SBI code describes the main activity of a entity. All companies with similar business activities share the same SBI code. For more information: https://business.gov.nl/running-your-business/business-management/administration/sbi-codes/

tradingName.description: One or more optional trading names the organization operates under.

EntityDataRes.description: Information you have to provide for KYC services regarding the entity

EntityDataResponse.title: EntityDataResponse
EntityDataResponse.description: Response object containing entity data for an entity user

code.description: The error's reference code. Use it when contacting the support team.

message.description: A description of the error.  These messages are for informational purposes only, are subject to change, and therefore should not be used programmatically.

Error.title: Error
Error.description: Describes an error in the system

countryOfIncorporation.description: A valid two-letter ISO country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

legalName.description: The legal name of the entity registered at the chamber of commerce.

ownershipLevel.description: Indicates if the ownership is direct or indirect.

ownershipPercentage.description: Percentage ranges from options: 0 up to but not including 25%, 25% up to but not including 50%, 50 up to but not including 75%, 75% up to and including 100%

ownershipPercentage.description: Percentage ranges from options: 0 up to but not including 25%, 25% up to but not including 50%, 50 up to but not including 75%, 75% up to and including 100%

IntermediaryShareholderEntityRes.description: Information you have to provide regarding an intermediate shareholder entity.

capacity.description: The capacity or role of the legal representative in the entity.

LegalRepresentativeRes.description: Information you have to provide regarding the legal representative of the entity.

firstName.description: The first name of a user including optional middle names separated by spaces

UltimateBeneficialOwnerDetailsReq.description: The information details required for the Ultimate Beneficial Owners of the entity

countryOfResidence.description: A valid two-letter ISO country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of the Ultimate Beneficial Owner

ownershipLevel.description: Indicates if the ownership is direct or indirect.

ownershipPercentage.description: Percentage ranges from options: 0 up to but not including 25%, 25% up to but not including 50%, 50 up to but not including 75%, 75% up to and including 100%

UltimateBeneficialOwnerDetailsRes.title: UltimateBeneficialOwnerDetailsRes
UltimateBeneficialOwnerDetailsRes.description: The information details required for the Ultimate Beneficial Owners of the entity

noUBOComment.description: When no Ultimate Beneficial Owner information is provided is it mandatory to provide a comment stating why no information is provided. Up to 256 characters are allowed.

ultimateBeneficialOwnerDetails.description: A list of one or more ultimate beneficial owners, or null if no information can be provided. In the latter case, the noUBOComment field should be populated.

UltimateBeneficialOwnerReq.title: UltimateBeneficialOwnerReq
UltimateBeneficialOwnerReq.description: The information required for the Ultimate Beneficial Owners of the entity.

noUBOComment.description: When no Ultimate Beneficial Owner information is provided is it mandatory to provide a comment stating why no information is provided. Up to 256 characters are allowed.

ultimateBeneficialOwnerDetails.description: A list of one or more ultimate beneficial owners, or null if no information can be provided. In the latter case, the noUBOComment field should be populated.

UltimateBeneficialOwnerRes.title: UltimateBeneficialOwnerRes
UltimateBeneficialOwnerRes.description: The information required for the Ultimate Beneficial Owners of the entity.

hasFormSteps.description: If the authorization process involves a form step this is true. (usually false, but true for scrapers, or more complicated banks.

hasRedirectSteps.description: If the authorization process involves a redirect this is true.

BicDynamicFieldDTO.title: BicDynamicFieldDTO
BicDynamicFieldDTO.description: Describes whether the BIC can be submitted when initiating a payment for this site.

cipher.description: Algorithm/Mode/Padding to use with asymmetric per field encryption

publicKey.description: Public key with which to encrypt credentials

CipherDetails.title: CipherDetails
CipherDetails.description: Cipher configuration and public key used for encryption

connectionType.description: Indicates whether this is a direct connection or through a scraper.

enabled.description: A flag which enables or disables the site, and it is controlled by the client.

noLongerSupported.description: If set to true, this site is no longer supported.

tags.description: The list of tags added to the site. This can be used to retrieve a specific site list and the tags are controlled by the client.

ClientSiteEntity.title: ClientSiteEntity
ClientSiteEntity.description: A site can be a bank or a creditcard company, etc.

CreditorAgentNameDynamicFieldDTO.title: CreditorAgentNameDynamicFieldDTO
CreditorAgentNameDynamicFieldDTO.description: Describes whether the Organization Name can be submitted when initiating a payment for this site.

CreditorPostalAddressLineDynamicFieldDTO.title: CreditorPostalAddressLineDynamicFieldDTO
CreditorPostalAddressLineDynamicFieldDTO.description: Describes whether the creditor postal address can be submitted when initiating a payment for this site.

CreditorPostalCountryDynamicFieldDTO.title: CreditorPostalCountryDynamicFieldDTO
CreditorPostalCountryDynamicFieldDTO.description: Describes whether the creditor postal country can be submitted when initiating a payment for this site.

DebtorNameDynamicFieldDTO.title: DebtorNameDynamicFieldDTO
DebtorNameDynamicFieldDTO.description: Describes whether the debtor name can be submitted when initiating a payment for this site.

creditorAgentBic.description: The BIC of the financial institution servicing an account for the creditor.

creditorAgentName.description: The name of the financial institution servicing an account for the creditor.

creditorPostalAddressLine.description: Unstructured address, must embed zip code and town name

creditorPostalCountry.description: Country in which a person resides or from which the affairs of that company are directed.

remittanceInformationStructured.description: Unique reference which can be used to match commercial invoices.

DynamicFields.title: DynamicFields
DynamicFields.description: Some banks allow for additional information to be sent when making a payment. This model allows you to send any of these dynamic, bank specific fields.

DynamicFieldsDTO.title: DynamicFieldsDTO
DynamicFieldsDTO.description: Describes the types of dynamic fields that are available for the site. Also shows whether the field is required when initiating a payment.

EXPLANATION.title: EXPLANATION

allOf.title: EXPLANATION
allOf.description: Form field with a descriptive message

EXPLANATION.description: Form field with a descriptive message

type.description: Encryption type; use this to switch between alternative implementations

EncryptionDetails.title: EncryptionDetails
EncryptionDetails.description: Configuration details describing the encryption algorithm.

FORM.title: FORM

filledInFormValues.description: The list of filled-in form values.

stateId.description: The state-id that is used to determine which process to relate this form login to. Think of it like a session.

oneOf.title: FORM
oneOf.description: A container object with the filled-in form values needed for login.

FORM.description: A container object with the filled-in form values needed for login.

FilledInFormValue.title: FilledInFormValue
FilledInFormValue.description: Contains the unique field identifier and its filled-in value.

stateId.description: The stateId that must be submitted along the form when posting it back.

FormStepObject.title: FormStepObject
FormStepObject.description: The object containing a form step in the login flow.

algorithm.description: JSON Web Encryption encryption algorithm to encrypt the Content Encryption Key (CEK), i.e. the 'alg' header of a JWE

encryptionMethod.description: JSON Web Content Encryption Algorithm (CEK). i.e. the 'enc' header of a JWE

publicJSONWebKey.description: JSON Web Key with which to encrypt credentials

Link.title: Link
Link.description: Link that can be used to perform an operation related to this object (HATEOAS)

LoginDTO.title: LoginDTO
LoginDTO.description: A container object with the redirect-url needed for login.

activityId.description: If not-null, the system has started an activity with this id.

LoginFormResponse.title: LoginFormResponse
LoginFormResponse.description: Contains the id for the user-site that is being created. To know exactly the status of the Login, call the get user-site status endpoint.

userSiteId.description: When calling the /initiate-user-site endpoint, this property refers to a user site that does not exist yet. In that case it's a reserved identifier. In case the step isn't completed this identifier will expire and will not be used anywhere.

LoginStep.title: LoginStep
LoginStep.description: The response when initiating the process to connect a user to a site. This object contains *either* a Form Step Object, *or* a Redirect Step Object.

LoginStepLinks.title: LoginStepLinks
LoginStepLinks.description: Links related to the LoginStep object (HATEOAS)

Onboarded.title: Onboarded
Onboarded.description: Describes whether the client is onboarded for this particular service on this site.

hasFormSteps.description: If the authorization process involves a form step this is true. (usually false, but true for scrapers, or more complicated banks.

hasRedirectSteps.description: If the authorization process involves a redirect this is true.

externalPaymentId.description: Identifier of the payment at the bank.  Non-null if paymenStatus <> INITIATED.

url.description: The URL the user should be redirected to.

RedirectStepObject.title: RedirectStepObject
RedirectStepObject.description: The object containing a redirect URL step in the login flow.

activityId.description: If non-null then a data fetch has started that involves 1 or more user sites.  If null then no data fetch could be started.

RemittanceInformationStructuredDynamicFi.title: RemittanceInformationStructuredDynamicFieldDTO
RemittanceInformationStructuredDynamicFi.description: Describes whether the site has the option to submit structured remittance information when initiating a payment.

supported.description: This field is used to show if the bank supports this payment type.

supportedFrequencies.description: The supported frequencies by the site when initiating a periodic payment.

SepaPeriodicPaymentDetailsDTO.title: SepaPeriodicPaymentDetailsDTO
SepaPeriodicPaymentDetailsDTO.description: Describes whether initiating Periodic SEPA payments is supported for this site.

supported.description: This field is used to show if the bank supports this payment type.

SepaScheduledPaymentDetailsDTO.title: SepaScheduledPaymentDetailsDTO
SepaScheduledPaymentDetailsDTO.description: Describes whether initiating Scheduled SEPA payments is supported for this site.

SepaSingle.title: SepaSingle
SepaSingle.description: Describes which features/properties/fields are available in the payment initiation for this bank. Presence of a field means it's an extra features. If it also has the 'required' flag, it is required for this bank.This field is deprecated, use the SepaSinglePaymentDetails object field for more in depth payment information.

supported.description: This field is used to show if the bank supports this payment type.

SepaSinglePaymentDetailsDTO.title: SepaSinglePaymentDetailsDTO
SepaSinglePaymentDetailsDTO.description: Describes whether initiating Single SEPA payments is supported for this site.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: The services of the site. All are nullable, however, at least 1 of them is not-null

healthStatus.description: The total calculated health of this site.

manualMaintenanceFrom.description: The start of manual maintenance for this site, in UTC.

manualMaintenanceStatus.description: The current manual maintenance status of the site.

manualMaintenanceTo.description: The end of manual maintenance for this site, in UTC.

successRatioForCreateOrUpdate.description: The success ratio (1.00 - 0.00) of an add bank / update operation. It might also be "not available" due to a lack of load on this site.

successRatioRefresh.description: The success ratio (1.00 - 0.00) of a refresh operation. It might also be "not available" due to a lack of load on this site.

SiteConnectionHealthStatus.title: SiteConnectionHealthStatus
SiteConnectionHealthStatus.description: An object containing information about the health of the site

supportedAccountTypes.description: The account types this site supports

SiteDTO.title: SiteDTO
SiteDTO.description: This object will be fetched when you add the request param fetchObject=site if it is supported by the endpoint

Step.title: Step
Step.description: Contains a step that the user needs to complete in order to successfully connect a user site.

cipher.description: Algorithm/Mode/Padding to use with generated symmetric key encryption

publicKey.description: Public key with which to encrypt symmetric encryption key and initialization vector

URL.title: URL

oneOf.title: URL
oneOf.description: A container object with the redirect-url needed for login.

URL.description: A container object with the redirect-url needed for login.

supported.description: This field is used to show if the bank supports this payment type.

supportedFrequencies.description: The supported frequencies by the site when initiating a periodic payment.

UkDomesticPeriodicPaymentDetailsDTO.title: UkDomesticPeriodicPaymentDetailsDTO
UkDomesticPeriodicPaymentDetailsDTO.description: Describes whether initiating Periodic UK Domestic payments is supported for this site.

supported.description: This field is used to show if the bank supports this payment type.

UkDomesticScheduledPaymentDetailsDTO.title: UkDomesticScheduledPaymentDetailsDTO
UkDomesticScheduledPaymentDetailsDTO.description: Describes whether initiating Scheduled UK Domestic payments is supported for this site.

supported.description: This field is used to show if the bank supports this payment type.

UkDomesticSinglePaymentDetailsDTO.title: UkDomesticSinglePaymentDetailsDTO
UkDomesticSinglePaymentDetailsDTO.description: Describes whether initiating Single UK Domestic payments is supported for this site.

connectionStatus.description: The connection status. This indicates whether we can fetch new data for this user site.

consentValidFrom.description: Consent was given by the PSU at this time.

lastDataFetchFailureReason.description: If the last refresh fails, this property indicates why. This is only notnull in case connectedStatus==DISCONNECTED.

lastDataFetchTime.description: The last time user-site was successfully refreshed

metaData.description: Contains meta data of the user-site, such as for some banks the region the user selected when adding the bank

UserSite.title: UserSite
UserSite.description: The connection between the user and a site.

balances.description: A list of all balance details received from the bank in the last refresh.

bankSpecific.description: Bank specific fields. These are special bank specific fields that will be propagated on request only.

externalId.description: The identifier of the account at the bank.

interestRate.description: The interest rate for the balance of this account. For savings and current accounts this relates to the interest given to the user. For credit card accounts it's related to the interest paid by the user.

lastDataFetchTime.description: The last time account was successfully refreshed.

linkedAccount.description: If this account is linked to another one (e.g. is a wallet), this value holds the external identifier the account that is linked to.

status.description: Status of the account. Defaults to ENABLED.

sortCodeAccountNumber.description: The sort code and account number. UK specific.

AccountReferencesDTO.title: AccountReferencesDTO
AccountReferencesDTO.description: An account reference. If this object is present, at least one of the sub properties is given

type.description: The balance types are formatted according to the ISO 20022 standard.

BalanceDTO.title: BalanceDTO
BalanceDTO.description: Contains information of one of the various types of balances available for the account.

availableCredit.description: Available credit. This is the amount that the account holder can still withdraw/borrow.

creditLimit.description: Credit limit. This is the total preset borrowing limit that can be used at any time by the borrower.

linkedAccount.description: The account to which the card is linked. For credit cards this will always be a CURRENT_ACCOUNT. Refers to the externalId of the current account

CreditCardAccountDTO.title: CreditCardAccountDTO
CreditCardAccountDTO.description: Contains information specific to credit card accounts.

CurrentAccountDTO.title: CurrentAccountDTO
CurrentAccountDTO.description: Contains information specific to current accounts.

labels.description: Extra labels detected by the model, for example 'salary' or 'refund'.

EnrichmentDTO.title: EnrichmentDTO
EnrichmentDTO.description: Fields provided by Yolt's data enrichment pipeline. This field will appear for clients that have data enrichment enabled on their account.

currencyFrom.description: The currency in which the transaction was started.

currencyTo.description: The currency of the target account.

rate.description: The conversion rate of currencyFrom -> currencyTo.

ExchangeRateDTO.title: ExchangeRateDTO
ExchangeRateDTO.description: The exchange rate of the transaction.

amount.description: The amount in the original currency

OriginalAmountDTO.title: OriginalAmountDTO
OriginalAmountDTO.description: The original amount of the transaction. Provided when a payment was initiated in a different currency than the account currency

isMoneyPotOf.description: Some banks provide 'savings goals' functionality. These 'pots' will be modeled as separate savings accounts.This savings account is a 'child' of another account. The other main account is referred to by this property. Please note that these are external references provided by the bank, so it points to another account.externalId

SavingsAccountDTO.title: SavingsAccountDTO
SavingsAccountDTO.description: Contains information specific to savings accounts.

counterparty.description: The counterpart of transaction that is part of the cycle.

cycleType.description: The type of cycle (i.e. debit or credit)

period.description: The recurrence period of the cycle.

predictedOccurrences.description: Set of dates on which the transaction in this cycle might occur.

subscription.description: Indication of whether or not this cycle is a subscription.

TransactionCycleDTO.title: TransactionCycleDTO
TransactionCycleDTO.description: The cycle to which transaction belongs. This refers to a recurring transaction.

bankSpecific.description: Bank specific fields. These are special bank specific fields that will be propagated on request only.

bookingDate.description: The Date when an entry is posted to an account on the ASPSPs books.

date.description: The date of the transaction. This is the date that is shown to the user by the bank, and not necessarily value date, booking date, ..

externalId.description: The identifier of the transaction at the bank.  This field is not guaranteed to be present.  It is also not guaranteed to be unique.

lastUpdatedTime.description: The last time this transaction was updated by Yolt.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the transaction with the time-offset included.

valueDate.description: The Date at which assets become available to the account owner in case of a credit.

next.description: The reference to the next page. This value should be provided by making a subsequent API call with this as query parameter next=${next}

userSiteId.description: The identifier of the user site.

UserSiteDTO.title: UserSiteDTO
UserSiteDTO.description: The user-site to which this account is linked.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth from the user

AddUser.title: AddUser
AddUser.description: Information you have to provide to create a user which will go through the KYC process
